item.title: 在对詹姆斯-克拉布里（James Crumbley）非故意过失杀人罪的审判过程中，法庭播放了一段此前未公开的视频，视频显示，就在牛津校园枪击案发生几小时后，他在执行搜查令之前告诉警察在他家中的什么地方可以找到枪支。
item.description:
Previously unseen video was shown in court during James Crumbley's involuntary manslaughter trial of him telling police where to find guns in his home prior to a search warrant being executed, just hours after the Oxford school shooting. https://t.co/GdjDiPZQfY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: .@AnneKFlaherty从弗吉尼亚州纽波特纽斯报道美军部署任务，在加沙地带外海建造码头，通过海路运送救援物资。
item.description:
.@AnneKFlaherty reports from Newport News, Virginia as U.S. troops deploy on mission to build a pier off the Gaza Strip to deliver relief and supplies by sea. https://t.co/yZiuDyR3yo pic.twitter.com/ovBxlfF96q

item.title: 美国国会众议院将于周三对一项两党法案进行投票，该法案规定，如果中国所有者不出售TikTok，美国将禁止使用这款广受欢迎的社交媒体应用：
item.description:
The House is set to vote Wednesday on a bipartisan bill that would ban the wildly popular social media app TikTok in the U.S. if its Chinese owners don't sell the app.

Here's how a possible ban could play out: https://t.co/qUbjBLcMIN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 前总统特朗普在为自己处理机密材料辩护的同时，再次对拜登总统处理机密文件的行为提出不实指控。
item.description:

item.title: 周二上午，宾夕法尼亚州发生一起房屋爆炸和火灾，现场发现两人死亡。
item.description:

item.title: 吉斯兰-马克斯韦尔（Ghislaine Maxwell）周二请求联邦上诉法院推翻对她的定罪和 20 年监禁的判决，因为她招募和诱导未成年少女，这些少女遭到杰弗里-爱泼斯坦（Jeffrey Epstein）的性虐待。
item.description:
Ghislaine Maxwell asked a federal appeals court on Tuesday to overturn her conviction and 20-year prison sentence for recruiting and grooming underage girls who were sexually abused by Jeffrey Epstein. https://t.co/IUQ2KaMJ6g pic.twitter.com/UmPWY7AX01

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 美国前总统特朗普说，如果他当选连任，他的第一件事就是 "释放 "因在1月6日美国国会大厦袭击事件中的角色而被定罪的人，特朗普继续声称这些人是 "被错误监禁的"。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump says one of his first acts if elected to a second term would be to "free" people convicted for their roles in the Jan. 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol, whom Trump continues to claim are "wrongfully imprisoned." https://t.co/5tnccZdNb2

item.title: 官员们说，一名雪崩预报员上周在俄勒冈州东部滑雪时引发雪崩，不幸身亡。这名预报员和一位朋友周三在群山（Gunsight Mountain）越野滑雪时引发了雪崩。
item.description:
An avalanche forecaster died in a snowslide he triggered while skiing in eastern Oregon last week, officials said.

The forecaster and a friend were backcountry skiing on Gunsight Mountain on Wednesday when the avalanche was triggered. https://t.co/CNQzaKArvR pic.twitter.com/3AjiRaW64M

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 民主党众议员亚当-希夫（Adam Schiff）指责前特别顾问罗伯特-赫尔（Robert Hur）将有关拜登总统记忆的言论包括在内，是为了 "用这种语言点燃政治风暴"。你很清楚自己在做什么"。
item.description:
Democratic Rep. Adam Schiff accuses former special counsel Robert Hur of including remarks about Pres. Biden's memory to "ignite a political firestorm with that language."

"You were not born yesterday. You understood exactly what you were doing." https://t.co/NMYOZjhwGL pic.twitter.com/SfaRZ1J95p

item.title: 研究人员确认了据信是世界上已知最古老的口红--一个装有深红色膏状物的华丽小石瓶。这件罕见的文物是在伊朗东南部发现的。
item.description:

The rare artifact was discovered in southeastern Iran. https://t.co/T6Y8mz8yQi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 卫星图像显示，以色列军方正在延长和扩建一条加沙公路，现在这条公路横贯加沙全境。扩建工程为利用新的基础设施运送人道主义援助提供了可能。
item.description:
A Gaza road being extended and expanded for use by the Israeli military now runs across the full width of Gaza, satellite imagery shows.

The expansion opens the possibility that humanitarian aid could be delivered using the new infrastructure. https://t.co/T7QS0UpaMm
